channel.title: [!UPDATE!]Zerocomfor 317 Restoration Proj.[!UPDATE!]
channel.description:
Zerocomfor 317 restoration
I am currently editing the butterscape 317 client and the d d s p 3 c e d source. What I am aiming torwards doing is clearing all the crap out of these things and making them a more enjoyable experience to code with. Also i want to bring back these old servers in what was the glory of the client customization and editing age. I never really liked the 317 era, but when i found my old butterscape client i wanted to do this for teh funz. I have added all the credits due to the rightfull owners of these original projects [code] Finished: Removed the cussing Editied out all of the crappy misplacements Removed all the added objects Restored the former objects Removed the starters Removed all npcs and stores Adding new npcs in original and conveniant locations Adding Ipanel Editing the configuration settings Adding more syi and null protectiong Alot more coming soon [/code] [code] Editing right now: Mapback, icons, and pvp [/code] Oh by the way, I started this project on 5/15/2010 6:15pm Pics Had trouble with the mapback :P [img]http://img204.imageshack.us/img204/9332/twte.png[/img] [img]http://img708.imageshack.us/img708/1858/fsfdfsdfsdf.png[/img] [img]http://img7.imageshack.us/img7/3230/54603736.png[/img] [img]http://img257.imageshack.us/img257/5703/317.png[/img]
NEW PICS! [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/169q6wp.jpg[/img] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/35mqtso.jpg[/img]
Teh updates, fixed gameframe (might give it a red tint to match the right click) [img]http://img193.imageshack.us/img193/9606/12494516.png[/img]
Password is black just to add effect :P if you don't like it i'll fix. Also edited the home, and almost every teleport and object cases are cleared! :D [img]http://img682.imageshack.us/img682/3568/defsgf.png[/img]

item.title: [!UPDATE!]Zerocomfor 317 Restoration Proj.[!UPDATE!]
item.dc:creator: @Javafire Javafire
item.description:
@Javafire wrote:

Spades:

I don’t like the GameFrame, and I don’t mind customs. Just the colored whips, you should have just kept the older look of them. If your going to code 317/377 try to keep it in that genre. The other customs seem fine with me. The skills tab, I don’t like that you have changed the skill icons. I think original looks are better. But again, this is my personal opinion. I don’t mean to troll. Just bored But good luck with this source.

yeah, the older whips were glitched… and i’m resetting the gameframe :), the skills and all the tabs along with it. For some reason the gameframe was an old one i had designed and never finished (in otherwords, complete crap)

me hates obama, im adding pics of the new starter and taking ones of the home.

Read full topic

item.title: [!UPDATE!]Zerocomfor 317 Restoration Proj.[!UPDATE!]
item.dc:creator: @Javafire Javafire
item.description:
@Javafire wrote:

[quote=“glestrts, post:14, topic:340631”][quote author=Javafire link=topic=436999.msg3211851#msg3211851 date=1274316087]
well most of these models aren’t mine, but when i release the beta version i can send you the models + ints in a pm message, along with a tutorial on how to add them to your server. :),
[/quote]
nah, I wont need a tutorial, if you ignore the rep factor, i’m actually pretty descent at this rsps stuff

i made this a staff armour with 100+ stats increase, pretty much all the staff items will give a high increase, but i plan on blocking a 999+ increase with all the armour together. That however will be very hard to do. I will first have to dislodge all these crappy commands and edit the folders for a more constructive platform.

just set it up so that if bonus value > 999;
return 999;
or something, i’ll try to get you the real thing though.[/quote]
ty m8 i will also put up a demonstration server (i will get moderator permsission to post on this topic). But i can’t host (port blocking, my father is a security admin), so i’ll get someone else to later. But that’s besides the point. I am taking out alot of stuff right now, i have new starter that has no effect on the economy of the server what so ever (all are new models, and i will pics). I also have to intagrate the models further for enhancement in stores. So far on my part of what i am claiming to do i am about 60% done. Hopefully by the end of the week i will have the demonstration server up.

Read full topic

item.title: [!UPDATE!]Zerocomfor 317 Restoration Proj.[!UPDATE!]
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

Javafire:

any of you guys can help out, but right now i’m going to be doing this alone untill i post further results. All the customs i am using are to be intagrated into the game for further use. As you know i am not a fan of making a client/server a crappy. But we all enjoy a little eye candy. I’m sure i will be capable of doing alot of this myself. But i am not an “expert” on this stuff anymore since i haven’t done it in so long. I will add further development infor when ready. So far about 78% of all customs are cleared and the former gameframe is almost finished

sweet lol

Read full topic

item.title: [!UPDATE!]Zerocomfor 317 Restoration Proj.[!UPDATE!]
item.dc:creator: @Javafire Javafire
item.description:
@Javafire wrote:

any of you guys can help out, but right now i’m going to be doing this alone untill i post further results. All the customs i am using are to be intagrated into the game for further use. As you know i am not a fan of making a client/server a crappy. But we all enjoy a little eye candy. I’m sure i will be capable of doing alot of this myself. But i am not an “expert” on this stuff anymore since i haven’t done it in so long. I will add further development infor when ready. So far about 78% of all customs are cleared and the former gameframe is almost finished
also I am almost finished with the new home. The ::bank command is crap so i am fixing that. Plus i am setting a few other safety fixtures. Such as a noclip to protect against most clients, and when a normal user gets hold of admin property they are banned temporarily and muted for a week. Along with their inventory and bank being cleared out.

Read full topic
